    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_80957</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Comment les planètes se déplacent</string>
            <string language="en">How planets move</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie Planeten bewegen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como os planetas se movem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come i pianeti si muovono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς οι πλανήτες κινούνται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo los planetas se mueven</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme illustre comment une planète bouge en fonction des jours et par rapport aux étoiles dans  l'espace extra-atmosphérique.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates how a planet move at different days with respect to the stars in outer space.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">les jours</string>
            <string language="en">days</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mouvement</string>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">espace extra-atmosphérique</string>
            <string language="en">outer space</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">planètes</string>
            <string language="en">Planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoile</string>
            <string language="en">stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht wie eine Planet 
Bewegung an den unterschiedlichen Tagen in Bezug auf die Sterne im 
Weltraum.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra como um movimento do 
planeta em dias diferentes com respeito às estrelas no espaço 
exterior.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra come un movimento del 
pianeta ai giorni differenti riguardo alle stelle nello spazio 
esterno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί πώς ένας πλανήτης 
κινείται στις διαφορετικές ημέρες όσον αφορά τα αστέρια στο 
εξωτερικό διάστημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra cómo un movimiento del 
planeta en diversos días con respecto a las estrellas en espacio 
exterior.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weltraum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planeten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sterne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
